Sentencas: Next-generation micro-solid oxide fuel cells for portable devices require nanocrystalline thin film electrolytes in order to allow fuel cell fabrication on chips at low operating temperatures and with high fuel cell power outputs.
Titulo: Crystallization of amorphous ceria solid solutions

Sentencas: In this study amorphous gadolinia-doped ceria (Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9-x) thin film electrolytes were fabricated by spray pyrolysis and their crystallization to nanocrystalline microstructures was investigated by means of X-ray diffraction and transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Crystallization of amorphous ceria solid solutions

Sentencas: At temperatures higher than 500 degrees C the amorphous films crystallize to a biphasic ceramic that is amorphous and nanocrystalline.
Titulo: Crystallization of amorphous ceria solid solutions

Sentencas: The driving force for the crystallization is the reduction of the free enthalpy resulting from the transformation of amorphous into crystalline material.
Titulo: Crystallization of amorphous ceria solid solutions

Sentencas: Self-limited grain growth kinetics prevail for the nanocrystalline grains where stable microstructures are established after short dwell times.
Titulo: Crystallization of amorphous ceria solid solutions

Sentencas: A transition to classical curvature-driven grain growth kinetics occurs when the fully crystalline state is reached for average grain sizes larger than 140 nm and annealing temperatures higher than 1100 degrees C. (C) 2007 Acta Materialia Inc.
Titulo: Crystallization of amorphous ceria solid solutions
